name: Event Horizon (itch) (CrabDev)
description:
A simple bullet-hell vertical scrolling game, featuring the ability to slow time

Made for a first-year game dev course submission

-Features-

  • Endless bullet-hell style waves
  • Nearly 20 enemy types - including 4 bosses
  • Slow time to evade bullets
  • Boss Rush mode
  • Collect powerups to use special attacks

-Controls-

ActionInput 1Input 2Move LeftLeft ArrowAMove RightRight ArrowDShootZLeft ClickSpecial AttackXSpace BarSlow TimeShiftRight Click
